items.content_html: Firebase-Starter-Kit is a lightweight, reusable repository that simplifies Firebase integration for your projects. It includes essential features like authentication, real-time data fetching, cloud messaging, storage management, and analytics. Perfect for quickly setting up scalable web or mobile apps with Firebase.
items.title: mrhassanali/Firebase-Starter-Kit:  Firebase-Starter-Kit is a lightweight, reusable repository that simplifies Firebase integration for your projects. It includes essential features like authentication, real-time data fetching, cloud messaging, storage management, and analytics. Perfect for quickly setting up scalable web or mobile apps with Firebase.
